name: Cities 4.0 2019
content: Cities 4.0 Conference and Exhibition will be a platform for participants to gather and discuss on frameworks and strategies that help to redesign businesses and cities as part of the USD 23 Trillion digital market; and measuring smart city and urban planning interrelation and identifies the meeting points among them. This is an unparalleled platform to get inspired, learn, experience and get connected with the industry peers. Register your interest at http://www.cities4pointzero.com/conference/fee By attending this Conference and Exhibition, you will walk away with essential information and strategies to adopt digital transformation in city planning and development; and improve the efficiency and services for the smart citizens. This will also be an effective platform for municipalities and project owners to source for vendors and consultants that could help to map out their digital transformation plans.
